Service Details: - Acknowledges neighbours who lend a helping hand in the community by clearing snow for those less able, all without being asked or expecting thanks- Volunteer Snow Busters can also join the Adopt your Block program by pledging and sharing their shovel adventures with the City using #KelownaSnowBuster on Twitter or Instagram- Nominees (Kelowna residents) will entered into the monthly draw for Rockets tickets
Eligibility: The Snow Buster must be a resident of Kelowna
How to Apply: Complete an online nomination form, submit a letter or send an email explaining why someone should be nominated
Address & Map: 1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Hall is located off Queensway
